component.text: Verificación de la tabla de routing IPv6 del R1
Verificación de la tabla de routing IPv6 del R2 y el R3

component.feedback: *** Debe introducir el comando exacto y completo.***
component.existingcommands: Verifique la tabla de routing IPv6 en el R2 y muestre solo las rutas OSPF.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 10 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, H - NHRP, I1 - ISIS L1
I2 - ISIS L2, IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP
EX - EIGRP external, ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination
NDr - Redirect, O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1
OE2 - OSPF ext 2, ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:1::/64 [110/648]
via FE80::1, Serial0/0/0
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:3::/64 [110/657]
via FE80::3, Serial0/0/1
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:A003::/64 [110/1294]
via FE80::3, Serial0/0/1
R2#
command.instruction: Ahora configure el router R3. Verifique la tabla de routing IPv6 en el R3 y muestre solo las rutas OSPF.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 10 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, H - NHRP, I1 - ISIS L1
I2 - ISIS L2, IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP
EX - EIGRP external, ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination
NDr - Redirect, O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1
OE2 - OSPF ext 2, ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:1::/64 [110/648]
via FE80::1, Serial0/0/0
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:2::/64 [110/657]
via FE80::2, Serial0/0/1
O 2001:DB8:CAFE:A001::/64 [110/1294]
via FE80::2, Serial0/0/1
via FE80::1, Serial0/0/0
R3#
command.instruction: Verificó correctamente las tablas de routing OSPF IPv6.
